tool_description: Obtain random Firefly quotes or quotes by specific characters.
name: FireflyQuotes
title: FireflyQuotes

api_list.name: Specific Character Quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fireflyquotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/Mal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fireflyquotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fireflyquotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/{chname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific Episode Quotes
api_list.description: This allows you to retrieve a random quote from a specific episode.
api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
